oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alkylation of isonitrile derivatives with 2,2 '-bis(bromomethyl)-1,1 '-biphenyl
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
BEHERA, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: alpha-amino-acid
peptides
photochemistry
isocyanides
reduction
carbon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A seven membered cyclic alpha-amino acid (AAA) derivative 10 has been prepared using ethyl isocyanoacetate as a glycine equivalent. The amino acid derivative 8 has been incorporated into a peptide chain using standard carbodiimide protocol. Alkylation of TosMIC with dibromide 4 followed by hydrolysis gives the seven membered keto derivative 13.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 43(5), 922-926
